title: Onboarding
description: Streamline the welcome process with digital forms, automated task assignment, and resource distribution for a great first impression.
fullDescription: Our comprehensive Onboarding module guides new hires through all necessary steps, from signing critical documents to training access. It uses automated workflows to ensure compliance and provides a personalized, seamless experience for every employee from day one.
author: ZetScore Team
overview: Our onboarding solution transforms the traditional employee welcome process into a seamless digital experience that sets the tone for long-term success and engagement.
keyBenefits: Personalized welcome experiences for each role
challengesSolved: We address the common pain points of manual onboarding processes, including paperwork delays, inconsistent experiences, compliance risks, and poor new hire integration that often leads to early turnover.

title: Background Checks
description: Quickly and securely initiate and track candidate background checks, ensuring regulatory compliance and informed hiring decisions.
fullDescription: Integrate with third-party providers to securely manage the entire background check lifecycle. Our platform provides real-time status updates, handles necessary disclosures, and maintains an auditable trail of all verification steps taken during the hiring process.
author: ZetScore Team
overview: Our background check system ensures thorough candidate verification while maintaining compliance and efficiency throughout the hiring process.
challengesSolved: We eliminate the complexity and compliance risks associated with manual background verification processes, providing a secure, efficient system that protects both the organization and candidates.

title: Work Authorization
description: Manage and track employee visa and work permit expiration dates to maintain continuous compliance with immigration laws.
fullDescription: This feature helps organizations maintain legal compliance by centralizing documentation related to employee work status, including I-9 forms and visa management. Automated alerts notify managers and HR of upcoming expiration dates, preventing potential legal issues and gaps in authorization and protecting the business.
author: ZetScore Team
overview: Our work authorization management system ensures continuous compliance with immigration laws through proactive tracking and automated notifications.
keyBenefits: Centralized document management for I-9 and visa forms
Automated expiration date alerts and reminders
challengesSolved: We solve the critical challenge of maintaining work authorization compliance in organizations with diverse workforce, preventing legal issues and ensuring business continuity.
